text: The M240 machine gun is a type of machine gun. It fires the 7.62mm NATO cartridge. It is gas-operated and the bullets are fed into the chamber by a belt. The M240 has been used by the United States Armed Forces since the late-1970s. It is used a lot by infantry. The M240 is also mounted onto ground vehicles, boats, and helicopters. ==Sources== Category:7.62 mm firearms Category:Medium machine guns Category:Machine guns of the United States
title: M240 machine gun
